Key: ...Stop. It looks as though the path to the\nMother Room is just right there.

This area. It looks like space has been ripped
in half.
...Yes. Correct. From here on, there is no\ndefined path.

I believe I can lead the way. I can feel
Marina's presence nearby.
How helpful. She should be able to sense\nyou as well. Be careful.
Okay, let's go.

(Man, what a sight. It's almost like there's
ground beneath my feet. But if I let my
guard down, I confuse my ups from downs.)
This way...

There's no way to tell how far we've gone
in here.

The disorientation you are feeling is more
extreme than it seems. Try not to focus on
it. We are definitely getting closer.
Shido, she is coming!

Goodness. You don't know when to quit,
Shido Itsuka. Ladies hate men who are
too persistent. Haven't you heard?

Marina, enough of this! You're making
everyone miserable!

That's not true. I already know. Even if I
destroy this world, there is one person who
supports me. So it is a necessary sacrifice.

Even so, there's no way to justify the deaths
of so many people!

Nor is there one to justify your hypocrisy,
Shido Itsuka. You should have submitted to
despair, and awaited your erasure.

Do not jest, you Artificial Spirit! Shido and I
will not relent in a place such as this! Come
at us! We shall end this!

End this? You mean disappear before me,
right?

Hehe... How foolish. You intend to take on
all of us by yourself?

Warning. Kaguya, only a villain would
use a cliché like that. Read the right line.

U-Urgh... But just look around! It befits our
situation! We have the upper hand, don't we?

Denial. Presuming to have an advantage is
exactly how trouble strikes.

Haha... Ahahahah! Good judgment there,
Berserk! I know all about you.

Astral Dresses, Angels. They pose a deadly
threat in the digital world as they do in the
real world. But did you think I wouldn't prepare?
Are those clones...? Like Kurumi?

How is it? Hmm? How is it? Of course, in
this world, I don't need to use this gimmick,
but I don't have time to play with you.

Are there dozens of her...? No, there's more
than that!
My, my. She's provoking us quite a bit.
Is it anything like your clones, Kurumi?

"They differ slightly from "us". "They" are
me" from another timeline, but this—
They're exact copies. Much like Kurumi's\nother selves, the real Marina is the strongest,\nbut with so many—

That's right. There's no limit. I can copy
myself as many times as I want.
Can you *really* win?
...Maria.
Yes, what is it, Tohka?
Is the main Artificial Spirit among them?
No, most likely not. All of these are replicas.

Is that so～? Then this should be a piece
of cake.
You're carefree, Diva.

Well, think about it. If you could really
produce endless copies, there'd be no
reason to hide the main body, no?

If you're still hidden from sight, then you're
afraid of the possibility of losing, aren't you?

Yes. Precisely. Well, she may be doing this
solely to waste our time.
Exactly. Too bad for you, Marina!
Ha... We'll see about that!

You getting flustered is evidence enough!
Shido, take Maria and go ahead.
Are you planning to stay behind, Kotori?

"Right. I'm doing a "Go ahead and leave it
to me" bit.

Isn't it better if everyone fought as a
group? There's too many of her.
Didn't Reine-san say there's no time? That's\nwhy you gotta go, Shido-kun and Maria-chan!

We're... fine here. We'll hold them back as a
team.
Even you, Yoshino? Well, I...

Just go, you dullard. We may have our
Astral Dresses and Angels, but it has no
effect on you. Know what that means?
Does that mean...?!
Yes, exactly. You protect Maria.

Please go... Shido-san. Please believe in
us. We believe in you, so...

Right! Maria, let's go. Do you know where
the real Marina might be?
Yes, perhaps... This way!
Let's hurry, Maria!

Yes. Although they are not as strong as
the main Marina, they still have Spirit-like
powers. Everyone... may struggle in battle.
As I thought.
Are you worried...?
No, I trust in them.

Yes. I trust in them as well. Over here, let
us hurry.
Right!
